name: Fate And Reckoning
description:
a prototype for my new rpg/survival game.

Controls:

 wasd/arrow keys to move,

 4.2.6 numpad to punch(left, front, right),

 z, x, c to attack with a weapon(left, front, right),

 T to interact, O for campfire menu,

Y for crafting menu,

 i for inventory

I will update the game biweekly to weekly.

Story: You are a  ogre slave that got shipwrecked whilst being transported to another country and you are lost on this island with nothing but yourself and your skills
